errors.cause: Spans not being sent, sampled out, or not reaching collector

solutions.code:
# Client-side sampling may drop spans
# Use sampler type: const with param: 1 for testing
export JAEGER_SAMPLER_TYPE=const
export JAEGER_SAMPLER_PARAM=1

# If using agent, verify it's running
curl http://jaeger-agent:5778/sampling?service=myservice

curl http://elasticsearch:9200/_cluster/health
# Jaeger env:
export SPAN_STORAGE_TYPE=elasticsearch
export ES_SERVER_URLS=http://elasticsearch:9200

cqlsh -e 'describe keyspace jaeger_v1_dc1'
# Jaeger env:
export SPAN_STORAGE_TYPE=cassandra
export CASSANDRA_SERVERS=cassandra:9042

errors.cause: Jaeger service not running or wrong address

solutions.code:
# Jaeger all-in-one ports:
# 5775/udp - agent zipkin thrift
# 6831/udp - agent jaeger thrift
# 6832/udp - agent jaeger binary thrift
# 14268 - collector http
# 16686 - query UI
curl http://localhost:16686

docker ps | grep jaeger
kubectl get pods -l app=jaeger

errors.message: Jaeger queries slow or timing out
errors.cause: Large dataset, missing indices, or storage performance

solutions.code:
# Always specify time range in queries
# Avoid 'Last 7 days' for large datasets

errors.message: Spans missing parent or incomplete trace
errors.cause: Parent span not propagated, dropped, or arrived late

solutions.code:
# Ensure trace context headers propagated:
# traceparent (W3C), uber-trace-id (Jaeger)
# x-b3-* (Zipkin)

# Allow more time for spans to arrive
export QUERY_MAX_CLOCK_SKEW_ADJUSTMENT=30s

# All services should use same sampling decision
# Use header-based sampling propagation

errors.cause: Protocol mismatch or OTLP not enabled

solutions.code:
# Jaeger 1.35+ supports OTLP natively
# Port 4317 (gRPC), 4318 (HTTP)
export COLLECTOR_OTLP_ENABLED=true

# Deploy OpenTelemetry Collector
# Configure jaeger exporter in collector

errors.cause: Service name not set or no traces yet

solutions.code:
# Client must set service.name
export OTEL_SERVICE_NAME=my-service
# Or in code:
tracer_provider = TracerProvider(resource=Resource.create({"service.name": "my-service"}))
# Send test span to verify pipeline works

# Services only appear if traces exist
# Check retention/TTL settings
